text: First, I'll introduce myselfー
My name is Fuma Kotaro.
Male student at Gosha Academy, a Taimanin training institution.
Perhaps because I was born a "Fuma," a distinguished family among Taimanin, people often treated me like a big shot at the academy...
But in truth, I was no one special.
I was just an ordinary student, like you'd find anywhere, who could do things a little differently than other peopleー

name: Me
text: Ahhhh... Yeah, coffee's gotta be black...
It was a morning like any other. The beginning of a day like any other.
While I was enjoying a cup of coffee in the living room after breakfast, a woman in a suit walked in.

name: Fuma Tokiko
text: Good morning, Master.

name: Me
text: Ahh. Morning, Tokiko.
This intellectual beauty was Fuma Tokiko.
Born into a family that had served the Fuma Can for generations, she had supported me as a butler from a young age.
As you could see, she was absolutely gorgeous, and she was also excellent as a Taimanin.
She was a woman that I trusted like family.

name: Me
text: This is unusual, though. For you to get up this late.
Normally, she got up far earlier than me and got things ready for the morning.

name: Tokiko
text: Ah!? I-It's justー
Tokiko suddenly cast her eyes downward in embarrassment.

name: Tokiko
text: That's because, Master... I mean, you... didn't let me sleep at all...

name: Me
text: Ah!! So that's why!!
Come to think of it, she was right.
Last night, I had gotten a bit carried away and gave Tokiko a bit too much loving.

name: Me
text: Sorry about that. Even though you have work to do.

name: Tokiko
text: No, it's fine. I'll always make time for you no matter how busy I am...

name: Me
text: Hehe, is that so. You are so adorable, Tokiko.
As you could tell from the conversation just now, Tokiko was simultaneously my butler and my lover.
While living in the same mansion together, before I knew it we were in that kind of relationship.

name: Me
text: If that's the case, I'll show you some love again tonight. Look forward to that, please, Tokiko.
I stood up, smiling at her.
It was about time to head to the academy.

name: Tokiko
text: Ah. Wait a moment, MasterーHere is your allowance for today.
Tokiko called out to me in a hurry and handed me a stack of bills.

name: Me
text: ーHm? Ah, thank you.
I took today's allowance from her, 1 million yen.

name: Tokiko
text: It's a small amount as always, since you're still a student, Master. Please somehow make do with this today.

name: Me
text: I know, Tokiko.
As the heir of the Fuma head family, I had inherited about 50 billion yen.
I had a huge fortune in my possession, but as Tokiko had said, I was still a student.
The money for my daily use was given to me by Tokiko in the form of an allowance.

name: Me
text: Alright, I'll be going then.

name: Tokiko
text: Yes♪ Have a good day, Masterー
I left the mansion, hearing the voice of my adorable lover from behind.
And with a million yen in the pocket of my school uniform.
A million yen was a child's allowance and would be gone in an instant if I played around a bit too much.
Tokiko was right though. As a student you couldn't ask for too much luxury.

name: Me
text: (Let's see... How about I buy Inageya's ice cream for everyone in class again today?)
With these thoughts in mind, I headed for the academy.
In front of the gate of Gosha Academyー
Gosha Village was an isolated village of Taimanin.
And Gosha Academy was a training institute for upcoming Taimanin within the village.

name: Female Student A
text: Ah!! It's Fuma-senpai!!

name: Female Student B
text: Good morning~!! What a wonderful day for training, isn't it?
As I was walking to the academy, students greeted me one after the other.
Most of them were girls, but there were also some boys who seemed to be my avid fans.
As for what grades they were in, there were my classmates, senpai, students in lower grades, the whole gamut.

name: Me
text: Ahh. Morning.

name: Female Student A
text: Kyaaa~!! The president looked over here and said hi~!!

name: Female Student B
text: That's not fair!! Student Council President!! Me too, me too~!!

name: Me
text: Ahh. Morning.

name: Female Students
text: Kyaaa~! Thank you so much~!!
The girls squealed, overcome with emotion.
Among them, the deep voices of some boys could be heard saying, "Heeey!! President, good to see you."

name: Me
text: (Sheesh. All of this just because I wished them a good morning...)
It happened on a daily basis though, so I was used to it.
As an aside, I was the student council president of Gosha Academy.
In last year's student council election, I had won in a landslide with 150% of the voteー

name: Me
text: (It was above 100% because they didn't follow the rule against voting more than once...)

name: Me
text: (So there was no shortage of students voting for me multiple times.)
Also, I hadn't run for president because I had wanted to, but because the people around me had passionately pushed me to do so.
If everyone was going to push for me, I had no choice but to perform my duties flawlessly.
And now the satisfaction rate with the student council was setting records at over 200%.

name: Me
text: Everyone, classes are going to start, so it's time for me to go. If you want a handshake, I can do it later.

name: Female Students
text: O~kay♪
I gave a wry smile as I spoke to the female students.
Before I had realized it, a line had formed and it looked like I was holding an impromptu handshake session.
This, too, was an everyday occurrence though.

name: Me
text: (C'mon, I just want to have a quiet school life...)
Even if I didn't want to stand out, I ended up doing so.
Even though I was just doing ordinary things, I ended up shining naturally.
I guess this was another one of my natural talentsー

name: Me
text: (Just kidding, I don't have that kind of hubris!)
At the end of the day, I was just an ordinary student who could do things a little different than other peopleー
Afternoon rolled around and PE class started.
As expected of an institute to train Taimanin, PE classes were combat trainings that simulated real battles.

name: Nisha Gaiza
text: Hey, Fuma!! Come and fight me!!

name: Me
text: Ah, Gaizaー
A fearless-looking boy was standing in front of me.
His name was Nisha Gaiza.
The Nisha Clan had served the Fuma for generations, and Gaiza and I had known each other since we were young.
In a way, you could say we were childhood friends...
But Gaiza seemed to have a problem with me and picked fights whenever he got the chance.

name: Me
text: That's fine with me... But I'm starting to get sick of it.
It was obvious what would happen if I fought against Gaiza.
And even though this was a training session, I didn't feel like doing meaningless things.

name: Me
text: Make this the last time. I'll even take on everyone who isn't happy with me at the same time.

name: Gaiza
text: What did you say!? Are you serious!?

name: Me
text: Pretty much. Are you getting cold feet?
I gave a wry smile and the simple-minded Gaiza snapped and turned red.

name: Gaiza
text: B-Bring it on...!!

name: Gaiza
text: So this will be the final battle!! Me or you, I'll make it clear which of us is superior!!!

name: Me
text: (Sheesh. I've already heard that so many times...)
